service.name: Drought Co-ordinators
service.description: Drought Co-ordinators assist with the delivery of mental health and social support services in drought-affected areas. A network of Drought Coordinators commenced on 1 April 2014. Drought Coordinators are located in Mt Isa, Longreach, Charleville, Tamworth and Armidale to ensure coordination with state-based and local services and complement other social support efforts in their regions. Drought Coordinators will travel to drought-affected areas to facilitate social services and attend community events. The Drought Coordinators are in addition to the social and mental support services operating in drought-affected areas of New South Wales and Queensland.
